abilityEffect.en: As long as Walrein ex is your Active Pokémon, put 1 damage counter on each Active Pokémon (both yours and your opponent's) between turns, excluding [W] Pokémon.

effect.en: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 40 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
If the Defending Pokémon is a [F] Pokémon, this attack's base damage is 120 instead of 80.
